creator: ruslan.zenin@gmail.com
text:
HTTP request sampler does not send Body data if HTTP DELETE call is requested with body data. In other words, there is no way to make HTTP request equivalent to the following cURL
curl -XDELETE http://host/endpoint -d "request_body"

creator: ruslan.zenin@gmail.com
text:
The issue exists only for client implementation "Java".

The workaround is to go to "advanced" tab of the HTTP Request Sampler and select client implementation "HttpClient4" instead of "Java"

For more information see:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45744099/jmeter-http-request-delete-with-body

The reference implementation for JMeter is HC4.
Java Implementation is historical and is meant to disappear.

Closing as WONTFIX unless you can propose a PR which we'll be happy to merge.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text: Thank you for clarification. Perhaps JMeter documentation to be updated to mention that "Java" implementation is deprecated.
